title: Confederacy of Dunces theology and geometry

content.prompt: In the last sentence of the first paragraph, Ignatius’ reference to “theology and geometry” conveys which of the following?

choices.label: His insincere claim that he possesses deeply held religious beliefs
His pretentious use of abstract concepts to justify his own preferences
His open arrogance about the knowledge that his extensive education has provided
His condescending attitude toward people of his mother’s generation

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
